product_name: Patagonia Synchilla Marsupial Fleece Pullover - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: A traditional fleece with an unexpected twist, the Patagonia Synchilla Marsupial fleece pullover features warm, lightweight insulation and a kangaroo-style pocket for stashing gear while on the go. Synchilla(R) fleece keeps you warm and comfortable when the temperature dips, continuing to insulate even when wet. Half-zip opening allows ventilation. Y-joint(TM) sleeves enhance comfort and fit during activity. Stretch binding at cuffs and hem provides a snug fit, sealing in warmth. Patagonia Synchilla Marsupial pullover features 1 mesh-lined marsupial pouch to keep fingers toasty warm. Closeout.
short_description: A traditional fleece with an unexpected twist, the Patagonia Synchilla Marsupial fleece pullover features warm, lightweight insulation and a kangaroo-style pocket for stashing gear while on the go.
